title: Tomorrow, Maybe
description: A startling, heartfelt PUSH novel from the author of PURE SUNSHINEFifteen-year-old Chan lives on the streets. She's run away from home and has no intention to go back. She doesn't care about anyone or anything . . . until ten-year-old Elizabeth comes into her life. A rough world becomes even rougher when you have someone you care about . . . .
author: Brian James
